This set is a Walmart exclusive. It has retail
column3: of $45 USD and was purchased at the ongoing discounted price of $25 ($0.041/piece).&nbsp
column5: free LEGO Masters storage playmat with $40 purchase.
column6: I ordered a separate LEGO set to qualify for the promotion.

column2: four sets in their original retail boxes (a&nbsp
column3: big box with four smaller boxes)&nbsp
column8: and can be used as a lightweight backpack (has two straps).&nbsp
column9: Not shown on the retail image is a rectangular 2&quot
column12: This is likely a safety feature and provides a quick peak inside the bag when closed.&nbsp

column2: Classic Bricks and Lights set retails for $30 and (at the time of review) can be purchased at Amazon for $23.
column3: It is like getting 11009 and getting a ton of freebies.&nbsp

column1: My son and I had fun using the included light bricks with the LightBrick Shadow Caster for shadow play.
column2: There are 12 shadow models to make and the extra pieces can provide creative opportunities for shadow play.
